meanings.definition: To remove lice from (someone or something)
meanings.sent1: She carefully delouses her pet cat to keep it healthy.
meanings.sent2: The special shampoo delouses the hair effectively.
meanings.sent3: The lice were so surprised when they got deloused!
meanings.sent4: After the treatment, the house felt deloused and refreshed.
meanings.sent5: The comb was like a superhero that delouses all the lice in one go.

meanings.sent1: He delouses the infested area to prevent further spread.
meanings.sent2: The medicine quickly delouses the entire family.
meanings.sent3: The lice had a party before they were deloused.
meanings.sent4: The deloused hair felt light as a feather.
meanings.sent5: The delousing process was like a magic trick making the lice disappear.
